title: Practice Challenge
description:
Given this HTML:
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
Write JavaScript using querySelector to: 1. Find the active menu item 2. Find all menu items 3. Find the primary button 4. Find all buttons 5. Log the text of the active item
instructions:
Given this HTML:
  • Home
  • About
  • Contact
Write JavaScript using querySelector to: 1. Find the active menu item 2. Find all menu items 3. Find the primary button 4. Find all buttons 5. Log the text of the active item

hints.text: Use '.item.active' for active item, '.item' for all items, '.primary' for primary button, 'button' for all buttons

commonMistakes.consequence: querySelector('myClass') looks for a <myClass> tag element, not a class selector.
commonMistakes.correction: Use .myClass for classes, #myId for IDs: document.querySelector('.myClass')

commonMistakes.mistake: Expecting querySelectorAll to be an array
commonMistakes.consequence: NodeList doesn't have array methods like map() or filter(), causing errors.
commonMistakes.correction: Convert first: Array.from(items).map(...) or use forEach which works on NodeList.
